class_notes:
Class Dates: 1/19, 1/26, 2/2, 2/9, alternate date: 2/16. Alternate dates are only used if the instructor or the school has an emergency that causes one of the scheduled dates to be canceled - they will not be held as makeup dates for a missed class.  When signing up for a course, please remember to keep alternate dates free also.


Please note that this class will be held on four dates in a longer time frame.  Failure to attend all classes in their entirety will result in a grade of Unsatisfactory.
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
